title: Bite Bot
description: An AI-powered recipe assistant that helps users discover recipes based on the ingredients they have on hand
goal: To build a responsive, AI-enhanced platform that supports users in efficient meal planning by suggesting relevant recipes. I created it because I enjoy cooking and thought it would be funâ€”plus, I often find myself unsure of what to make with my in-stock groceries.
features: AI recipe suggestions: recommends recipes based on selected ingredients using intelligent filtering
Ingredient dropdown: users can select ingredients from an Aâ€“Z list
Smart matching: filters recipes that contain all or most of the chosen ingredients
Responsive design: optimized for both mobile and desktop users
Performance-first development: built with Vite for fast load times and smooth user experience
ðŸ˜Š Custom Lottie animation: designed and created entirely by me to add a fun and engaging touch

title: TileTactics
description: A Kulami-inspired strategic tile game where players place and move tiles to create patterns and block opponents
goal: To recreate the strategy and tactical depth of Kulami with modern digital features and a responsive design
features: Turn-based gameplay: players take turns to place and move tiles
Show possible moves: highlights valid tile placements for players to consider
Restart option: option to restart the game and play again from the beginning
Marble count: keep track of how many marbles each player has placed or captured
Responsive design: optimized for desktop and mobile devices

images.imageDesc: TileTactics gameplay screen during active game play
TileTactics gameplay screen during active game play, showing the possible moves

title: Minesweeper
goal: To create a responsive Minesweeper game
features: Responsive design: adapts to different screen sizes for a smooth experience on all devices
Options to change grid size: users can customize the grid size for different difficulty levels
Game difficulty options: players can select from easy, medium, or hard difficulty
Flagging for mobile: an option to flag cells on small-screen devices where right-click is not available
Win/Loss count: displays the number of wins and losses for the player

images.imageDesc: Minesweeper gameplay screen showing game size option
Minesweeper gameplay screen during active play
Minesweeper gameplay screen showing game over
Minesweeper gameplay screen showing the flag option on a small-screen

title: Word Pyramid
description: A strategic word game inspired by pyramid structures
goal: To create a responsive and strategic word puzzle game
features: Pyramid structure for word creation
Daily challenge mode
Responsive design

images.imageDesc: Word Pyramid gameplay screen during active play
Word Pyramid congratulation screen after winning, with sign-up prompts
Word Pyramid gameplay screen with prompt to return tomorrow for a new puzzle

title: Wish Tree
description: A simple, responsive platform to help users manage their wish lists and shopping lists for holidays and special dates
goal: To create an interactive and user-friendly platform for users to create, track, and share their wishes
features: Create custom wish lists for special dates (e.g., birthdays, holidays)
Wish tracking: users can track the status of their wishes to avoid duplicate gifts
Wish fulfillment: option to mark wishes as completed
User profiles: users can have personalized profiles to keep track of their wishes
Special dates reminder: reminders for upcoming important dates and wishes
